======Base pierce chance for shotgun.======

= Description =

Controls the likelihood of a shotgun pellet piercing an alien.

Requires <!--[asw_shotgun_piercing]-->[[asw_shotgun_piercing.wiki|asw_shotgun_piercing]] to be higher than 0.
